# Eazy Visas

> Visa consulting services for tourist, business, and student visas â€” plus dummy flight tickets and hotel bookings for visa applications.

## About
Eazy Visas is a one-stop solution for all visa documentation needs. We provide end-to-end visa consulting services including document preparation, application guidance, dummy flight ticket bookings (verified itineraries), and dummy hotel bookings for visa applications. Based in Navi Mumbai, India, we serve clients globally.

## Key Pages
- Home: https://www.eazyvisas.com/
- About: https://www.eazyvisas.com/about
- Contact: https://www.eazyvisas.com/contact
- Countries: https://www.eazyvisas.com/countries

- Business Visa: https://www.eazyvisas.com/services/business-visa

- Dummy Hotel: https://www.eazyvisas.com/services/dummy-hotel
- End-to-End Service: https://www.eazyvisas.com/services/end-to-end
- Most Preferred Package: https://www.eazyvisas.com/services/most-preferred

## Services
- Tourist Visa Consulting: Complete tourist visa application and processing services with document checklist and guidance
- Business Visa Consulting: Business visa consultation, documentation, and application services
- Student Visa Consulting: Student visa guidance and application processing
- Dummy Flight Booking: Temporary, verifiable flight reservations (itineraries) for visa applications
- Dummy Hotel Booking: Temporary, verifiable hotel reservations for visa applications
- End-to-End Visa Service: Complete visa processing from documentation to approval
- Most Preferred Package: Combined flight + hotel + itinerary package for visa applications
